subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson beat teammate Jeff Gordon on Sunday to win the U.A.W.-DaimlerChrysler 400. It was his third consecutive victory in a Nextel Cup race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson beat teammate Jeff Gordon on Sunday to win the U.A.W.-DaimlerChrysler 400. It was his third consecutive victory in a Nextel Cup race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
